Title: In A Lonely Place
Plot: Jen and Audrey are tempted to risk their new relationships with Dawson and Pacey after interviewing a couple of cute musicians. Meanwhile, Pacey's caught by surprise when he realizes Jack has taken him to a gay bar, and Dawson's curious upon seeing Joey's reaction when she catches Professor Wilder on a date.
GuestStars: Drew Wood, Nick Cornish, Amy Wray, Michael Kroeker
